Sentence.sentence: Within just the past five years, I have noticed parents returning to a belief that teenagers need the guidance of elders rather than the liberal, anything goes mode of child-rearing that became popular in the second half of the 20th century.

Sentence.sentence: Anything produced in the West can be labeled green.

Sentence.sentence: They hardly pay anything for the problems they have caused.

Sentence.sentence: Despite the ease with which the rich can acquire almost anything they desire, they are just as likely to be unhappy as the middle classes

Sentence.sentence: It does not really touch on anything serious.

Sentence.sentence: Nor do I go to cocktail parties, dinners or anything like that.

Sentence.sentence: I don't attend services when I am there, and I have never meditated, there or anywhere; I just take walks and read and lose myself in the stillness, recalling that it is only by stepping briefly away from my wife and bosses and friends that I will have anything useful to bring to them
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Do you have anything like that?

Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As a special law, no one can build anything on the stray.

Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I … I mean I didn't know anything about it.

means.word_mean: （用于否定句、疑问句中以及 if 或 whether 和 prevent、ban、avoid 等动词后，代替 something）任何东西，任何事物

sentences.en: I want something to eat; anything will do.
sentences.cn: 我想吃点东西, 随便什么都行。

sentences.en: Is there anything wrong?
sentences.cn: 有什么毛病吗?

sentences.en: Do you know anything about that country?
sentences.cn: 你对那个国家了解得多吗?

sentences.en: Is he anything of a statesman?
sentences.cn: 他像个政治家吗?

lj.lj_ly: it doesn't taste anything like wine.
she said it out loud, clear as anything.
lj.lj_ls: 她高声把话说出来，再清楚不过了。

jx.jx_en_mean: [usu. with negativeor in questions](informal)added as a general reference to other things similar to the thing mentioned
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)或其他什么的（补充与前面提到的事物相似的事物）

lj.lj_ly: no strings attached, you don't have to join up or anything.
lj.lj_ls: 又没什么条件，你没必要入伍或是其他什么的。

jx.jx_en_mean: By no means; not at all

lj.lj_ly: I was anything but happy about going.

entry.def: You use anything in statements with negative meaning to indicate in a general way that nothing is present or that an action or event does not or cannot happen.
entry.tran: （用于否定句）任何事物，什么事情

example.ex: We can't do anything...
example.tran: 我们什么都做不了。

example.ex: Dad sat, not saying anything...
example.tran: 爸爸坐着，一声不吭。

entry.def: You use anything in questions and conditional clauses to ask or talk about whether something is present or happening.
entry.tran: （用于疑问句或条件从句）任何事物，任何事情

example.ex: What happened, is anything wrong?...
example.tran: 怎么了，出什么事了吗？

example.ex: Did you find anything?...
example.tran: 你找到什么了吗？

entry.def: You can use anything before words which indicate the kind of thing you are talking about.
entry.tran: （用于描述所谈论事物的词语前）…的东西，…的事情

example.ex: More than anything else, he wanted to become a teacher...
example.tran: 他最想成为一名教师。

example.ex: Anything that's cheap this year will be even cheaper next year...
example.tran: 今年的便宜货明年会更便宜。

entry.def: You use anything to emphasize a possible thing, event, or situation, when you are saying that it could be any one of a very large number of things.
entry.tran: （用于加强语气）无论什么东西，随便什么事情

example.ex: He is young, fresh, and ready for anything...
example.tran: 他年轻又富有朝气，什么事都愿意做。

example.ex: At that point, anything could happen...
example.tran: 那一刻，什么事都可能发生。

entry.def: You use anything in expressions such as anything near ,anything close to and anything like to emphasize a statement that you are making.

example.ex: Doctors have decided the only way he can live anything near a normal life is to give him an operation...
example.tran: 医生的结论是只有做手术，他才有可能过上基本正常的生活。

example.ex: Only Cowans played anything close to his true form...
example.tran: 只有考恩斯算是发挥出了正常水平。

entry.def: When you do not want to be exact, you use anything to talk about a particular range of things or quantities.

example.ex: Factory farming has turned the cow into a milk machine, producing anything from 25 to 40 litres of milk per day...
example.tran: 集约饲养把奶牛变成了生产牛奶的机器，每天差不多要挤出25升到40升的牛奶。

example.ex: Fights with his father lasted anything between fifteen minutes and an hour.
example.tran: 和他父亲争吵了大约15分钟到一个小时。

entry.def: You use as anything after an adjective to emphasize a quality that someone has.
entry.tran: （用于形容词后表示强调）非常，十分

example.ex: He used to be as smart as anything...
example.tran: 他过去聪明绝顶。

example.ex: She opened the door and jumped out, quick as anything.
example.tran: 她打开门，飞快地跳了出来。

entry.def: You use anything but in expressions such as anything but quiet and anything but attractive to emphasize that something is not the case.
entry.tran: 单单除…之外;根本不;远非

example.ex: I will be anything but quiet on Saturday night!...
example.tran: 星期六的晚上我根本静不下心来！

example.ex: There's no evidence that he told anyone to say anything but the truth...
example.tran: 并无证据表明他让什么人隐瞒真相。

entry.def: You can say that you would not do something for anything to emphasize that you definitely would not want to do or be a particular thing.

example.ex: I wouldn't want to move for anything in the world...
example.tran: 就是天塌了我也不搬走。

example.ex: I wouldn't have missed this summer in England for anything...
example.tran: 我本来说什么也不会错过在英格兰的这个夏季的。

entry.def: You use if anything, especially after a negative statement, to introduce a statement that adds to what you have just said.
entry.tran: （尤用于否定句后，对所说之事进行补充说明）甚至正相反，甚至还不如说

example.ex: I never had to clean up after him. If anything, he did most of the cleaning.
example.tran: 我从来不用跟在他后面打扫卫生。恰恰相反，他包揽了大部分的清洁工作。

entry.def: You can add or anything to the end of a clause or sentence in order to refer vaguely to other things that are or may be similar to what has just been mentioned.
entry.tran: 或其他什么的；诸如此类

example.ex: Listen, if you talk to him or anything make sure you let us know, will you...
example.tran: 听着，如果你和他说话或什么的，一定要让我们知道，好吗？

example.ex: He didn't cry or scream or anything.
example.tran: 他没哭也没喊，什么事也没有。

sentences.cn: 它不便宜。绝对不。

sentences.cn: 那一刻，什么事都可能发生。
sentences.en: At that point, anything could happen...

sentences.cn: 医生的结论是只有做手术，他才有可能过上基本正常的生活。
sentences.en: Doctors have decided the only way he can live anything near a normal life is to give him an operation...

sentences.cn: 只有考恩斯算是发挥出了正常水平。
sentences.en: Only Cowans played anything close to his true form...

sentences.cn: 但是像饶舌那样的歌曲，并不是很像音乐，我从中学不到任何东西。
sentences.en: But some music, like rap, isn’t very musical and I can’t learn anything from it
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 没有人能够获得任何东西,除非他值得拥有它. 这是一个永恒的法则.
sentences.en: No one can get anything unless he earns it. This is an eternal law.

sentences.cn: 任何东西减慢或加速探测器的更新换代?
sentences.en: Does anything slow or accelerate probe degradation?

sentences.cn: 那些角色是会走路 、 说话 、 生活 、 呼吸的生物,与这个世界上的任何东西都不一样.
sentences.en: The characters are walking, talking, living, breathing creatures unlike anything in this world.

sentences.cn: 他们将学习他们能够掌握的任何东西.
sentences.en: They will learn from anything they can get hold of.

sentences.cn: 不, 在你看医生之前你不能吃任何东西.
sentences.en: No, you must n't eat anything until you see the doctor.

sentences.cn: 这没有假冒任何东西; 这是真正的人造皮毛.
sentences.en: It isn't fake anything; it's real synthetic fur.

sentences.cn: 家庭主妇: 我不与要任何东西. 况且我现在正忙.
sentences.en: Housewife: I don't need anything. And I'm busy now.

sentences.cn: 我的长矛非常锋利,它可以穿透任何东西.
sentences.en: My spear is so strong that it can pierce through anything.

sentences.cn: 书虫型读者可能读任何东西都会比一般的简单读者快一些.
sentences.en: Avid readers are more likely to read anything faster than average or minimalist readers.

sentences.cn: 在验血前你最好不要吃任何东西.
sentences.en: You'd better not eat anything before a blood test.

sentences.cn: 对任何东西一知半解都是危险的.
sentences.en: Half knowledge of anything is dangerous.

sentences.cn: 产品是能够用以满足人类某种需要或欲望的任何东西.
sentences.en: A product is anything that can be offered to satisfy a need or want.

sentences.cn: 她不能用任何东西来交换她的秘密食谱.
sentences.en: She would not trade anything for her secret recipe.

sentences.cn: 由于浓雾,我几乎看不见任何东西.
sentences.en: I could hardly see anything for the fog.

sentences.cn: 其中艺人说除了天空的兰色以外,他看不到其他任何东西.
sentences.en: One said he could not see anything except the blue the sky.

sentences.cn: 千万别从嘴里把任何东西吐到盘上或地下.
sentences.en: Do not spit anything from your mouth on to the plate or on to the floor.

sentences.cn: 你说过, 任何东西没有用时,一定得扔掉.
sentences.en: You said, Anything that isn't necessary must be dispensed with.

sentences.cn: 听着, 不要嘘走寂静, 不要用任何东西替代它.
sentences.en: Listen up, people, do not shush away silence, do not replace it with anything anymore.

sentences.cn: 我的隐形眼镜掉了, 现在看不清任何东西.
sentences.en: My contact lens has fallen out, I can't see anything.

sentences.cn: 人们可以不用走出家门直接在线购买任何东西,享受咨询服务.
sentences.en: One can buy anything directly online and enjoy advice service going out of his home.

sentences.cn: 同样的,要根据你的对手的情况来调整, 捕食者可以轻松对抗空军以外的任何东西.
sentences.en: Also adapt to your opponent is doing, Predators work fine against anything aside from air units.

sentences.cn: 扭动你的手指如果你能感觉到任何东西.
sentences.en: Wiggle your finger if you feel anything.

sentences.cn: 由于它是“静态 ” 的,所以不需要我们创建任何东西.
sentences.en: Since it's static you don't need to create anything.

sentences.cn: 对日本人来说, 泼溅任何东西都是不文明的.
sentences.en: To a Japanese, spilling anything is uncouth.

sentences.cn: 你可以为接口里面的任何东西创建占位符: 方法, 属性, 索引器, 事件.
sentences.en: You can create placeholders for anything in an interface: methods, properties, indexers, and events.

sentences.cn: 焚化炉能把任何东西都烧掉.
sentences.en: The incinerator burns anything.

sentences.cn: 除了这个思想之外,你们没有任何东西可以作你们的依靠.
sentences.en: You will never have anything to sustain you, except the idea.

sentences.cn: 我热爱我的工作,不愿意用它交换任何东西.
sentences.en: I love my job and wouldn't change it for anything.

sentences.cn: 今天的报上有什么重要东西 吗 ?
sentences.en: Is there anything important in todays paper?
